page.title: 09LEISURE IN ASHDOWN FOREST
page.content: Ashdown Forest provides a lovely setting for rambles, birdwatching and all activities associated with nature. For the energetic there is Coleman's Hatch Cricket Club and the Bowls Club. Both grounds are on the Forest, in beautiful surroundings. The Horticultural and Sports Society holds a yearly show, with races and entertainment for children, and showing of flowers and vegetables, and raising of money for charity. The Hartfield Singers practice in the Church Hall, giving concerts twice yearly. Bell ringing flourishes, as does the Mother's Union and Womens Institute, taking keen interest in countrywide affairs. A yearly gymkhana is held and the History Group regularly brings the past to life. Anything you want to do is possible in this community.
